series_title: Six Year Improvement Program (SYIP): District Work Folder
series_description: This series documents transportation meetings related to Six Year Improvement Program (SYIP) development and final public hearings for projects in each district. This series may include, but is not limited to: allocation hearings, working papers, drafts, forms, spreadsheets, documentation of with senior management and the Secretary of Transportation, written transcripts, petitions, congressional correspondence, audiovisuals and other materials submitted to VDOT.

This series documents the Six Year Improvement Program (SYIP) for interstate, primary, and urban systems that is updated annually and provided to the public via the Internet. This series may include, but is not limited to: documentation allocations to projects for all phases of development over a year period.
